EML10.original: Man, i fucked things up. I know I did. But you weren't a saint. You weren't. You're who you are, and you do bad shit. and hanging out with you made me do bad shit, even though it ain't your fault. but i did bad shit to you, because you were my world. i thought you would kill me and you didn't. so that makes you a better person than some. i'm so glad we are friends now.
EML10.translated: 老兄，我是个烂人，这我知道。但你也不是什么圣贤，绝对不是。你就是你，你也会做坏事。跟你混在一起害得我也跟着做坏事，尽管这不是你的错。但我做了蠢事拖你下水，因为你就是我的全部。我以为你会杀了我，但你没有，说明你比某些人强多了。很高兴我们现在还是朋友。

EML10.original: I ain't in the mood for internet chit chat, Ash. Have a nice life. Johnny.
EML10.translated: 我现在没心情在网上闲聊，小艾。祝你幸福。 Johnny

EML10.original: Ash, Ain't much point going over shit again. Whole world we live in is fucked up and we belong in that world. Things weren't meant to be, and I don't seem to be the family man type. I'm your friend, nothing more. Not ever. I can't watch you do any more drugs. Good luck staying clean this time. Johnny.
EML10.translated: 小艾，没必要再翻那些旧账了。我们所在的这个世界就是狗屁，但我们还就属于它。事情不应该这样的，而我也不是什么居家好男人。我们是朋友，仅此而已。一直如此。我不能眼睁睁看着你吸更多毒品了。祝你这次能多洁身自好一会儿。 Johnny

EML10.original: Good luck Ashley. Please don't contact me again.
EML10.translated: 祝你好运，Ashley。 请不要再联系我了。

EML10.original: Good luck Ashley. Please stay the fuck away from me.
EML10.translated: 祝你好运，Ashley。你他妈离我越远越好。

EML10.original: I don't care, Ash. Stay away from me. Please.
EML10.translated: 我不在乎，小艾。离我远点，求你了。

EML10.original: i fucked up. it weren't my fault. i got thrown out of the facility. it weren't my coke. I love you, Johnny. i love you. drugs ain't shit. you're my drug. Listen, Johnny, can i borrow some money, for a few days? I miss you. i miss you so much.
EML10.translated: 我搞砸了，明明不是我的错。我被从设施里赶了出来。那不是我的可卡因。我爱你，Johnny。我爱你。毒品算什么，你才是我的毒品。呃，Johnny，你能借我点钱吗，就几天？我真的很想你。

EML10.original: it makes me happy to know you're on my side and even though we ain't together and we both fucked this thing up, we are at least friends. i'm off the drugs, Johnny boy. i'm off them. i don't want to get high no more. Not ever. i'm sorting myself out. i'm even exercising. i went running yesterday. i was nearly a model, one time.
EML10.translated: 尽管我们分手了，尽管我们都成了烂摊子，但你能站在我这边还是让我很高兴，至少我们还是朋友。我戒毒了，Johnny仔。我戒掉了。我再也不想吸嗨了，一点都不想。我要重回正轨了。我甚至都开始运动了。我昨天去跑步了。我就像个模范人物，有生以来的头一次。

EML10.original: I checked into rehab again last week. i feel rough, but this time it's going to stick, i know it.
EML10.translated: 我上周又去戒毒所了。感觉很难，但这次一定会成功，我知道的。

EML10.original: i'm going to go to college or something. Give back. i miss you. it won't never be the same without you, but it's the way it's got to be. i know that. we both did bad shit and we hurt each other and people who love each other ain't meant to hurt each other.
EML10.translated: 我在考虑去上大学，重回正轨。我好想你。没有你一切都完全不同，但现在也只能这样了。我知道的。我们都做过蠢事，伤害了对方，而相爱的人是不会故意伤害对方的。
